trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men før modusen endres faktisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel konfigurering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer for en bestemt modus eller avbryte endringen modus når denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewModeEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is changing, to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En DetailsViewModeEventArgs-objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne modus som i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen endrer, for å finne ut om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>hendelsen ble opp som et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen, eller angi en insert-operasjonen kan avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne den nye modusen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property to change to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>til å endre til en alternativ-modus ved å sette verdien til en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>til å fastslå om brukeren avbrøt en redigeringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel an insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte en insert-operasjonen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewModeEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen DetailsViewModeEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>|The value of the `cancelingEdit` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>|The value of the `mode` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>| Verdien for den `cancelingEdit` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>| Verdien for den `mode` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> hendelsen ble hevet som følge av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> hendelsen ble opp som et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men før modusen endres faktisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelingEdit property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CancelingEdit-egenskapen for å finne ut om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>hendelsen ble opp som et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control whenever the user cancels an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel tilbakestille den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen når brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> hendelsen ble hevet som følge av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir modus som i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> endrer kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewMode property to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NewMode-egenskapen til å fastslå modus som i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen endrer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control based on the mode to which it changes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel konfigurere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll basert på den endres-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to specify the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å angi modus som i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere endringene ved å sette verdien til en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.
